Title: Authorizes the Bellmore Fire District to file an application for exemption from real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the Bellmore Fire District to file an application for exemption from real property taxes with the assessor of the county of Nassau.
LawCode: Amd ยง1, Chap of 2022 (as proposed in S.6035-A & A.6950-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2022 authorizing the Bellmore Fire District to file an application for exemption from real property taxes, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 6035-A and A. 6950-A, in relation to making a technical correction thereto
